result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Gloria Jimenez-Mendoza

records.addlTxt: The 10/11/2022 hearing has been rescheduled to 11/23/2022 at 1:45 pm at the request of the defense attorney.

Defendant, Gloria Jimenez-Mendoza, appeared with Attorney Adam Galaviz.  Attorney Daniel Alejandro Bernard Deida appeared for the Prosecution.  Clerk JT  Minutes:  ST called witnessKPD Det Ryan Pfeffer; sworn in and testified; cross-examination by Atty Galaviz. ST rested and moved for bind over; arguments heard. Probable cause  found; bound over for trial. Information filed; reading waived. Not guilty pleas entered. Scheduling Order given to Attorney in court.   Bond continued.  Judicial Pretrial - in court scheduled for October 11, 2022 at 09:15 am.

Adjustment Number: 22A 413643,
Payable Number: 346789,
Receipt Number: 22R 022243,
Amount: $20.00
Defendant is not eligible for public defender representation.

PROPER ATTIRE REQUIRED.  NO SHORTS OR TANK TOPS ALLOWED IN COURTROOM.
  *Not to drive w/o VALID Driver's License.  No contact including the residence, electronic or 3rd party with: Jennifer M - except for incidental at church

02:05 PM    Assistant District Attorney Brenda Valdes appeared for the State.  Defendant in custody and appeared in court w/ Attorney Benjamin Schwarz.  Clerk JT  Minutes:  Defendant requests preliminary hearing within 20 days; set before Commissioner on August 16, 2022 at 09:00 am.  $750  Signature Bond Set w/conditions (see bond event).  ts
and witness list filed by the State
